description: This source file defines a React component called JobsPage that displays a job monitor interface. It includes state hooks for managing job data, status filter, loading state, and error messages. It fetches job data from an API service when mounted and provides a UI with a status filter dropdown, a refresh button, and a table component to display jobs. Error handling and loading indicators are also implemented.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function that sets loading state, clears errors, fetches the list of jobs filtered by current status, updates the jobs state, and handles errors.
